Event.name: Soaking
Event.definition: <def-root>In this frame, an <fen>Agent</fen> places the <fen>Theme</fen> in the <fen>Medium</fen> for an extended period of time, with the intent that the <fen>Theme</fen> will be affected by and absorb some of the <fen>Medium</fen>. <ex> <fex name="Agent">Ellen</fex> <t>soaked</t> <fex name="Theme">the beans</fex> <fex name="Medium">in the water</fex> <fex name="Duration">for 30 seconds</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> is the person performing the soaking.</def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Theme</fen> is the entity that changes location. <ex> Ellen <t>soaked</t> <fex name="Theme">the beans</fex> <fex name="Medium">in the water</fex> <fex name="Duration">for 30 seconds</fex> .</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>The amount of time for which the <fen>Theme</fen> is soaked.</def-root>

Arg.name: Medium
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Medium</fen> is the substance in which the <fen>Theme</fen> is submerged.<ex>Bobby <t>soaked</t> the potatoes <fex name="Medium">in water</fex> overnight.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Container
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Container</fen> that holds the <fen>Theme</fen> which is submerged and the <fen>Medium</fen> that it is in. <ex><t>soak</t> the potatoes <fex name="Container">in a medium-sized pan</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The action of the <fen>Agent</fen> that brings about the soaking.
<ex><t>Soak</t> the beans <fex name="Means">by placing the entire package, unopened, in the water</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The situation that the <fen>Agent</fen> hopes to bring about by soaking the <fen>Theme</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: soak.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: make or become thoroughly wet by immersion in liquid.

lexUnit.name: marinate.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: with obj. soak in a marinade.

lexUnit.name: steep.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to make something thoroughly wet by immersing it in a liquid
